properties.title: Amphitheater at Dura Europos
properties.comment: Capacity and date drawn from N. Pollard's “Soldiers, Cities, and Civilians in Roman Syria”, p. 52
properties.label: Dura

properties.title: Amphitheater at Lyon
properties.comment: The capacity refers to number of seats after the early 2nd AD century expansion. In AD 19 the capacity was under 2000.
properties.label: Lyon

lastuse.source: Letter of Theoderic to Flavius Anicius Maximus (Cassiordorus, Variae V.42)

lastuse.comment: Need a reference but end of use attributed to 363 earthquake.
Last use dated to eruption of Vesuvius that covered the town.

bibliography.dc:bibliographicCitation: P. Zanker, Pompeii: Public and private life (Cambridge, MA, 1998) 68-72.
K. Welch, The Roman Amphitheater from its Origins to the Colosseum (Cambridge, MA, 2007) 192-198.

properties.comment: Date based on main period of military activity at the site.
properties.label: Newstead

properties.title: Amphitheater at Literno
properties.comment: Location is incorrect. Said to be south of city wall.

lastuse.comment: See the website but a better reference needed.

properties.title: Amphitheater at Bourges
properties.comment: Dimensions very approximate on the basis of modern street plan.
properties.label: Bourges

properties.title: Amphitheater at Chassenon
properties.comment: No longer extant and structure may have been a theater. Dimensions from 1844 publication.
properties.label: Chassenon

properties.title: Amphitheater at Drevant
properties.comment: Arena oval is almost complete so very a near a “full” amphitheater.
properties.label: Drevant

properties.title: Amphitheater at Pupput
properties.comment: So far, available information is incomplete. Site as proxy for location.
properties.label: Pupput

properties.title: Amphitheater at Rimini
properties.comment: Date on the basis of coins of Hadrian found in foundations.
properties.label: Rimini

properties.title: Amphitheater at Imola
properties.comment: Briefly mentioned in PECS via Perseus, with dimensions. Said to have been covered.
properties.label: Imola

properties.title: Late Roman Amphitheater at Aphrodisas
properties.comment: Inserted into east end of pre-existing stadium.

dimensions.comment: Arena not regular oval. Measurements intended as a useful approximation.

properties.label: Aphrodisias
